text: Otoko no haishin-sha mo on'na no haishin-sha mo, subete dōruidearu. Kare-ra wa jaaku o meiji, tadashī koto o kinji,(arrā no michi no tame ni tsuiyasu koto ni) sono-te o tojiru. Kare-ra wa arrā o wasureruga, kare mo kare-ra o wasure rareru. Hontōni haishin-sha-tachi wa, arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu
